info.title: GIRIK Backend API
info.description:
## Choose role, then see APIs

**Sections below are ordered by role.** Under each role, APIs are grouped by module (folder).

| Role | Jump to first section |
|------|------------------------|
| Admin | Use the **Filter** box and type `Admin` to show only Admin APIs |
| GM | Use the **Filter** box and type `GM` to show only GM APIs |
| TM | Use the **Filter** box and type `TM` to show only TM APIs |
| TO | Use the **Filter** box and type `TO` to show only TO APIs |
| TA | Use the **Filter** box and type `TA` to show only TA APIs |
| Surveyor | Use the **Filter** box and type `Surveyor` to show only Surveyor APIs |
| Client | Use the **Filter** box and type `Client` to show only Client APIs |
| Flag Admin | Use the **Filter** box and type `Flag Admin` to show only Flag Admin APIs |

Use the **Filter** box above the endpoints to type a role name (e.g. `Admin`, `Client`) and see only that role's APIs. Each section heading is **Role » Module** (e.g. **Admin » Users**, **Client » Jobs**).
